traits.description: Dugs reach adulthood in their early teens and live an average of 75 years. Their violent nature often leads to violent ends.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Dugs' angry nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Dugs typically stand between 3 and 4 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Courageous
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Fisticuffs
traits.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

traits.name: Fury of the Small
traits.description: When you damage a creature with an attack or a power and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or power to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Menacing
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

traits.name: Strong and Small
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 25 feet.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Dug.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Echani reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Echani culture's emphasis on honor and combat cause them to tend towards lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Echani stand between 5 and a half and 6 feet tall and weigh around 150 lbs, with little variation between them. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Allies of the Force
traits.description: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Insight) check against someone you know to wield the Force, you are considered to have expertise in the Insight skill.

traits.name: Unarmed Combatant
traits.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

traits.name: Echani Art
traits.description: If a humanoid you can see makes a melee weapon attack, you can use your reaction to make a Wisdom (Insight) check against the target's Charisma (Deception). On a success you learn one of the following traits about that creature: it's Strength, Dexterity or Constitution score; bonus to Strength, Dexterity or Constitution saving throws; armor class; or current hit points. On a failure, the target becomes immune to this feature for one day. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of once). You regain all expended uses on a long rest.

traits.name: Combative Culture
traits.description: You have proficiency in Lore and Acrobatics.

traits.name: Martial Upbringing
traits.description: You have proficiency in light armor, and gain proficiency with two martial vibroweapons of your choice.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one extra language of your choice.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength or Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Esh-kha reach adulthood in their early teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: The esh-kha's stubborn and racially-centric mindsets cause them to tend toward lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Esh-kha typically stand 6 to 6 and a half feet tall and generally weigh about 200 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Force-Sensitive
traits.description: You know your choice of the *turbulence*, *force disarm*, or *slow* at-will force powers. Your forcecasting ability is Wisdom or Charisma (depending on power alignment).

traits.name: Inquisitive
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Investigation skill.

traits.name: Savage Attacks
traits.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

traits.name: Skill Versatility
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency in two vibroweapons or blasters of your choice.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kharan. Kharan contains many metaphorical expressions when translated to Galactic Basic. The language has many comparisons to music and singing, such as a galactic government being compared to a chorus.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Falleen reach adulthood in their late teens and live up to 250 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Falleen societal structure causes them to tend to be lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Falleen typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh around 165 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Closed Mind
traits.description: Falleen brains have an unusual composition which make them resistant to influence from the Force. You have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against force powers.

traits.name: Enthralling Pheromones
traits.description: You can use your pheromones to influence individuals of both sexes. Whenever you roll a 1 on a Charisma (Persuasion) check, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. Additionally, once per short or long rest, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower on a Charisma check as a 10. This feature has no effect on droids or constructs.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour at a time.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Falleen. Falleen is characterized by its common use of the Z and X sounds, of which the Falleen are fond.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Felucians reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Felucians' connection to the Living Force causes them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Felucians typically stand over 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 200 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Force-Sensitive
traits.description: You know the *burst* at-will force power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *beast trick* force power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *plant surge* force power once per day. Wisdom is your forcecasting ability for these powers.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Stealthy
traits.description: You are proficient in the Stealth skill.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Felucianese, and one more language of your choice. Felucianese is characterized by guttural, whisper-like vowels, interspersed with hard clicks.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Flesh raiders reach adulthoood by 20 and rarely live longer than 90 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Flesh raiders' propensity towards war and aggression cause them to tend toward chaotic dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Flesh raiders typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 200 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

traits.name: Cannibalize
traits.description: If you spend at least 1 minute devouring the corpse of a beast or humanoid, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of one). Once you've used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Force Contention
traits.description: Due to their unique physiology, flesh raider hardiness allows them to overcome use of the Force. You have advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws against force powers.

traits.name: Menacing
traits.description: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

traits.name: Hunters
traits.description: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Survival) check to hunt for food, you are considered to have expertise in the Survival skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rakata. Rakata is characterized by its deep tones and simplistic nature, using mainly consonants and long vowels. It's script seems to be a very ancient form of Galactic Basic.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Gand reach adulthood when they earn their name, which is usually in their teens, and live to be about 70 on average.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Gand tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Gand stand 4 to 6 feet tall and weigh around 100 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Exoskeleton
traits.description: You have a thick exoskeleton. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Gand Resilience
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage (explained in chapter 9).

traits.name: Lungless
traits.description: Gand do not have lungs, and therefore do not need to breathe.

traits.name: Regenerative
traits.description: When you take damage, you can use your reaction and expend a Hit Die to regain hit points as long as the damage would not reduce your hit points to 0.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Gand. The Gand language does not use pronouns as Gand refer to themselves in the third person, so often Gand who speak Galactic Basic are difficult to understand.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity or Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ganks reach adulthood in their late teens and live for slightly more than a century thanks to their cybernetics.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ganks aggressive and hair trigger nature causes them to tend towards chaotic dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ganks typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet. You ignore the strength property of heavy armor.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

traits.name: Gank Training
traits.description: You have proficiency in light and medium armor as well as two vibroweapons or blasters of your choice.

traits.name: Mercenary Specialization
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills: Intimidation, Persuasion, Stealth, or Perception.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Gank. You can communicate with other ganks within 30 feet without speaking through use of cybernetic implants. Tech casters can detect the communication but canï¿½t understand it.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: You Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution or Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Geonosians reach adulthood at 10 and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Geonosians' greedy and self-serving nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Geonosians typically stand from 5 to 6 feet tall and rarely weigh more than 80 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Crafter
traits.description: Geonosian culture promotes artisanry. You have proficiency in one set of artisan's implements of your choice.

traits.name: Exoskeleton
traits.description: You have a thick exoskeleton. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. While wearing medium or heavy armor, your flying speed is reduced by half.

traits.name: Geonosian Weaponry
traits.description: You have proficiency in blasters that deal sonic damage.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Geonosian. The Geonosian language consists of click consonants through use of a Geonosians' dual mandibles. This makes it difficult for other species to learn to speak it.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Givin reach adulthood in their early teens and live about 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Givins believe power and respect are earned rather than expected, causing them to tend towards balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Givin typically stand around 6 feet tall and weigh 150 lb. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Hardened Exterior
traits.description: You have a tough, bony exterior. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Mathematical Savants
traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (Technology) check involving mathematics, you are considered to have expertise in the Technology skill.

traits.name: Stargazer
traits.description: You have proficiency in Piloting and Technology.

traits.name: Vacuum Sealed
traits.description: You can survive for one day within the vacuum of space. You still require oxygen to breathe. You have resistance to cold damage.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Givin. Givin is characterized by its use of mathematical jargon and symbols, making it nigh incomprehensible to the less mathematically inclined.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Gormaks reach adulthood in their late teens and live for more than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Gormaks' warlike nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Gormaks typically stand 5 and a half to 6 and a half feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Adaptive Resilience
traits.description: Their innate understanding of technology allow gormak to readily adapt to its effects. You have advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws against tech powers.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Technological Affinity
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Technology skill, one vibroweapon and one blaster of your choice, and your choice of armstech's implements, biotech's implements, constructor's implements, mechanic's kits, or tinker's implements. Additionally, you have advantage on Intelligence (Technology) checks made to understand, utilize, or modify technology that you are unaware of or have never seen before.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Gormak. Gormak is primitive and gruff, often lacking definitions for things found outside of their homeworld.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Gotals reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Gotals' polite and respectful nature causes them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Gotals typically stand 6 to 7 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Energy Sensors
traits.description: Gotals perceive the environment around them through use of electromagnetic sensors held in their cranial horns. You have blindsight out to 30 feet. If another trait would grant you blindsight, the range is increased by half as many feet.

traits.name: Hunter
traits.description: You are proficient in Survival.

traits.name: Natural Empathy
traits.description: Gotal's electromagnetic sensors allow them to sense the emotions in those around them. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine emotions against humanoids and beasts within 10 feet of you.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Antarian. The Antarian language is characterized by growls and clicking noises at various volumes.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Gran reach adulthood around their late teens and live up to 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Gran highly organized society cause them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions..

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Gran typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh around 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Slow Metabolism
traits.description: You are able to go a number of days without food equal to 3 + twice your Constitution modifier before suffering exhaustion.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.description: Through use of infrared vision, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Reader of Hearts
traits.description: Through identifying subtle variations in a target's body heat, the Gran are able to better understand their emotions and intentions. You are proficient in the Insight skill.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Gran. It is rare to hear Gran spoken on any world other than Kinyen.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Half-humans gain the ability score increases of their non-human half, but they can choose any ability score for one of the options, instead of the given option. Half-humans can not increase the same ability score twice during character creation using this feature.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Half-humans live around the average of the two species' lifespans.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Half-humans tend towards their non-human half's alignment.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Half-humans stand and weigh around the average of the two species' height and weight. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is the size of your non-human half.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is that of your non-human half.

traits.name: Defiant
traits.description: Half-humans are known to be stubborn and often refuse to give up, even against the worst odds. When you or a creature you can see that can see and understand you makes an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can roll a d4 and add it to their roll (no action required). You can use this before or after the roll, but before the GM determines the roll's outcome. Once you've used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, regardless of whether or not the non-human half can speak it, and the language(s) associated with your non-human half.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength, Constitution, and Intelligence scores increase by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Harch reach adulthood at age 10 and can live up to 200 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Harch are cold, calculating beings, causing them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Harch stand around 6 feet tall and weigh between 200 and 300 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Bite
traits.description: Your fangs are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage. Lastly, as a bonus action, you can perform a special bite attack. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, the target is poisoned until the end of its next turn, and you can't use this feature again until you complete a short or long rest.

traits.name: Six-Armed
traits.description: Harch have six arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Strength (Athletics) checks that involve climbing, and while climbing you always have two hands free.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Harchese. Harchese is discernible from other insectoid languages by a noticeable emphasis on consonants, especially the "ch" sound.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Herglic reach adulthood in their late teens and live up to 120 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Herglics' gentle nature causes them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Herglic stand between 6 and 8 feet tall and weigh up to 600 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour at a time.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Technician
traits.description: You are proficient in the Technology skill.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Herglese. Herglese has a clear and commanding cadence, drawing the attention of those who hear it.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ho'din reach adulthood in their early 30s and live up to 120 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ho'dins' benevolent nature causes them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ho'din are taller than most species, typically standing 8 to 10 feet tall and generally weighing about 275 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Biological Specialists
traits.description: You have proficiency with Medicine or Survival (your choice).

traits.name: Cold Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on Constitution saving throws made to avoid exhaustion due to extreme cold.

traits.name: Crafters
traits.description: You have proficiency with one artisan's implements of your choice.

traits.name: Naturalist
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Nature skill.

traits.name: Rain Forest Dweller
traits.description: Growing up in the rain forests of Moltok has left an impact. You don't treat forest terrain as difficult terrain.

traits.name: Reptilian Senses
traits.description: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check related to sensing heat, you are considered to have expertise in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Second Heart
traits.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Treeclimber
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Strength (Athletics) checks that involve climbing.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, and Ho'Din. Ho'Din consists of croaks and hisses. Its written form includes characters derived from the shapes of Moltok flora. The Ho'Din lexicon includes a great amount of plant-based idioms and metaphors.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Houk reach adulthood in their late teens and live for about 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Most houk are short-tempered and deceitful, causing them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Houk typically stand 6 to 8 feet tall and generally weigh about 300 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Stealth skill.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Houkese. Houkese is mainly formed by grunts, with subtle tonal inflections to differentiate words that would otherwise sound the same. Written Houkese uses primitive ideograms with one letter to represent each simple verb, and complex pictograms to represent nouns.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Hutts are considered a child until around the age of 200 in which they are a full fledged adult.  Hutts can live upwards of 900 years with even more ancient ones exceeding that.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Hutts are selfish, greedy, and highly organized, causing them to tend toward chaotic dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Hutts have a unique special characteristic; from birth to death, they never stop growing. As an adolescent hutt, you typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh at least 400 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 20 feet.

traits.name: Closed Mind
traits.description: Hutt brains have an unusual composition which made them resistant to influence from the Force. You have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against force powers.

traits.name: Natural Resistance
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage (explained in chapter 9).

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

traits.name: Prehensile Tail
traits.description: You have supreme control over your tail and can use it to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

traits.name: Shrewd Demeanor
traits.description: You have proficiency in two Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma skills of your choice.

traits.name: Slow and Lethargic
traits.description: Hutts are slow and generally incapable of moving quickly. You have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and when determining your bonus to AC from your Dexterity, you can't add more than +3.

traits.name: Wealthy
traits.description: During character creation, you start with additional credits equal to your level x your proficiency bonus x 1,000 cr.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Huttese. Hutts rarely speak Galactic Basic, even though they are perfectly able; if the person with whom they are speaking doesn't understand Huttese, they are more likely to use an interpretor than deign to speak the language of lesser species.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Iktotchi reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Iktotchi are lawful and tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Iktotchi typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh about 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Precognition
traits.description: You can see brief fragments of the future, that allow you to turn failures into successes. When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Telepathy
traits.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet of you. You must share a language with the target in order to communicate in this way.

traits.name: Horns
traits.description: Your horns are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Pilot
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Piloting skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Iktotchese.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kage reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kages' rigid sense of honor causes them to tend toward lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kage typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall, and weigh around 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Animal Handler
traits.description: You are proficient in Animal Handling.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

traits.name: Strong-Legged
traits.description: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: You've lived most of your life without direct sunlight. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Unarmed Combatant
traits.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

traits.name: Weapon Training
traits.description: Kage are adept warriors. You are proficient with the electroprod and electrostaff.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one language of your choice.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kaleesh reach adulthood in their early teens and live to be about 80.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kaleesh tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kaleesh typically stand about five and a half feet tall and weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: The thermal pits under a Kaleesh's eyes grant darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Weapon Training
traits.description: Kaleesh are adept hunters. You are proficient with the blaster carbine, vibroblade, vibropike, and, vibrospear.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Tracker
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Survival skill. Additionally, you are considered to have expertise in Wisdom (Survival) checks made to track a creature if that creature has a scent.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kaleesh.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kallerans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kallerans' individualistic society causes them to tend towards chaotic alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kallerans typically stand 6 and a half to 8 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Flexible
traits.description: You have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks that involve flexibility.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing.

traits.name: Prehensile Feet
traits.description: You have supreme control over your feet and can use them to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

traits.name: Snap Senses
traits.description: Through your antenna, you can sense incoming danger and react accordingly. When you roll for initiative, you can choose to gain advantage on the roll. Alternatively, if you are surprised, you may act normally on your first turn. Once you've used this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kall. Kall depends upon distinct antenna movements communicate correctly. This leads to this characteristic antenna movement when kallerans speak Galactic Basic. Because antenna movement is an integral part of Kall, it is difficult for most other species to master.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2 and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kaminoans reach adulthood at 11 years old and live around 100 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kaminoans highly organized society lead individuals to tend toward a lawful alignment, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kaminoans typically stand 7 to 8 feet tall and weigh around 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Geneticist
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Medicine skill.

traits.name: Long-Limbed
traits.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

traits.name: Tech Dabbler
traits.description: You know the *temporary boost* at-will tech power. Your techcasting ability is Intelligence. You do not require use of a wristpad for this power.

traits.name: Ultraviolet Sight
traits.description: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check related to sight, you are considered to have expertise in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kaminoan. Kaminoan is characterized by its flowing water-like sound.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kakarodon reach adulthood in their early teens and live to be about 70.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Karkarodons' warmongering nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Karkarodons stand 5 to 7 feet tall and weigh upwards of 250 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Bite
traits.description: Your sharp teeth are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage. Lastly, as a bonus action, you can perform a special bite attack. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1), and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Karkaran. Karkaran is characterized by its fierce sounds.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kiffar reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kiffar are independent and free spirited, causing them to tend towards chaotic alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kiffar vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Iron Will
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

traits.name: Nimble Reflexes
traits.description: Kiffar are naturally adapted to avoiding the Force. You have advantage on Dexterity and Intelligence saving throws against force powers.

traits.name: Tribal Warrior
traits.description: You have proficiency with two vibroweapons of your choice.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one extra language of your choice. Kiffar never had a tongue to call their own, using Galactic Basic as far back as their history goes.

traits.name: Kiffar Heritage
traits.description: A small percentage of the kiffar population are naturally Force-sensitive, able to read the memories contained within inanimate objects, while others train to become proud guardians of their home sector. You choose one of the following heritages:

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Killiks reach adulthood in their 40s and live an average of 200 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Killiks' willingness to brainwash or kill their enemies cause them to tend towards the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Killiks stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh about 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Four-Armed
traits.description: Killiks have four arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

traits.name: Hardened Carapace
traits.description: While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Strong-Legged
traits.description: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Telepathy
traits.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet of you. You must share a language with the target in order to communicate in this way.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Killik. You can understand spoken and written Galactic Basic, but your vocal cords do not allow you to speak it.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength, Constitution, and Wisdom scores increase by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Klatooinians reach adulthood in their late teens and can live as long as 90 standard years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Klatooinian society encourages reverence for tradition and an inclination towards violence, causing them to tend toward lawful dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Klatooinians typically stand around 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Enforcer
traits.description: You are proficient in the Intimidation skill. When you take the Help action to give an ally advantage on an Intimidation check, they gain a bonus to the roll equal to your proficiency bonus.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Weapon Training
traits.description: Klatooinians are trained to fight from a young age. You have proficiency in two martial vibroweapons of your choice.

traits.name: Wisdom of the Elders
traits.description: You are proficient in the Lore skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Klatooinian, and Huttese. Klatooinian is a gutteral, barking language, with many loanwords adopted from Huttese over the centuries.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kubaz reach adulthood in their early teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kubaz' courteous nature causes them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kubaz typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and weigh around 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Art Obsession
traits.description: Whenever you make an ability check related to the acquisition or location of art or valuables, you are considered proficient in the check. If you would already be proficient, you instead have expertise.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Deft Hand
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills: Deception, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Slicer
traits.description: You have proficiency with the Technology skill and the slicer's kit.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kubazian. Kubazian is comprised of a unique series of whirring, nasally syllables, causing Kubaz to have a high-pitched accent when speaking other languages.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kushibans reach adulthood at 13 and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kushibans' playful nature causes them to tend toward chaotic light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kushibans typically stand 3 and a half to 4 feet tall and weigh around 40 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
traits.description: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Hide
traits.description: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier. Additionally, your thick hide is naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Nimble Agility
traits.description: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

traits.name: Stealthy
traits.description: You are proficient in the Stealth skill.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kushiban. Kushiban has a bubbly, joyful tone to it.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Kyuzo reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Kyuzos' belief in justice and honor cause them to tend toward lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Kyuzo typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Your natural evolution allows you to see what others do not in dim and dark conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Foreign Biology
traits.description: Kyuzo struggle in atmospheres other than those of Phatrong. You wear a filter mask, and if your mask is removed while you are in such an environment, you lose consciousness.

traits.name: Long-Limbed
traits.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

traits.name: Strong-Legged
traits.description: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kyuzo. Kyuzo is characterized by short words and quick phrases. Kyuzo struggle with Galactic Basic as it is grammatically dissimilar to Kyuzo.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Lanniks reach adulthood in their 100's and can live up to 900 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Despite the turbulence on their homeworld, Lanniks tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Lanniks typically stand 3 to 4 feet tall and rarely weigh more than 50 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Closed Mind
traits.description: Lanniks have a natural attunement for the Force, which makes them resistant to its powers. You have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against force powers.

traits.name: Force-Sensitive
traits.description: You know the *guidance* at-will force power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *valor* force power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *force enlightenment* force power once per day. Wisdom is your forcecasting ability for these powers.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Wisdom of the Elders
traits.description: You are proficient in the Lore skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lannik. Due to their large ears, the Lannik language is spoken softly, and it is considered insulting to shout.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Lasats reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Lasat' honorable tendences cause them to tend toward lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Lasats tower over other species, averaging 7 feet tall and weighing over 200 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Bo-rifle Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with blaster rifles, bo-rifles, and vibrostaffs.

traits.name: Climbing
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lasat, a language whose *r*'s are difficult to replicate by most other species.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Lurmen reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: The pacifistic nature of the lurmen causes them to be neutral light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Lurmen typically stand around 3 feet tall and generally weigh about 45 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Natural Healer
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Medicine and Nature skills, and the bioanalysis kit.

traits.name: Prehensile Tail and Feet
traits.description: You have supreme control over your tail and feet and can use them to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

traits.name: Rolling Agility
traits.description: As a lurmen, you can run on all fours, or curl into a ball, to move quickly along the ground. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

traits.name: Treeclimber
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 25 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Strength (Athletics) checks that involve climbing.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lurmese. Lurmese is a name collectively given to the various tribal languages spoken by the lurmen people. While each language is distinct, shared phrases allow translation between dialects.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution increases by 2, and your Strength increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Massassi live relatively short lives. They reach adulthood after 14 years, and reach old age around 40 years of life.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: The massassi are savage and brutish warriors who relish on the violence of combat, usually following a dark and chaotic nature.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Massassi are between 7 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 200 and 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Type
traits.description: Your creature type is both aberration and humanoid.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canï¿½t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Force Symbiosis
traits.description: When you reach 3rd level, you can cast your choice of the *curse*, *dun moch*, or *hex* force power once per day. Your forcecasting ability is Charisma.

traits.name: Hide
traits.description: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Oversized
traits.description: Lightweapons and vibroweapons that lack the dexterity or light property are considered to have the heavy property for you. The strength number for blasters is reduced by one step (from 19 to 17, 17 to 15, 15 to 13, or 13 to 11). If the strength number is 11, you ignore it entirely.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Sith. Sith is an agglutinative language, in which words or even phrases were made up of linear sequences of distinct meaningful units.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Mikkian reach adulthood in their late teens and live a little over a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Mikkian's honor and integrity based culture causes them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Mikkian typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 120 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Blindsight
traits.description: Mikkian can perceive the world around them through heat and radiation. You have blindsight out to 30 feet. If another trait would grant you blindsight, the range is increased by half as many feet.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.description: Your head-tendrils provide a keen awareness of your surroundings. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing.

traits.name: Bureaucratic
traits.description: You have proficiency with Persuasion or Intimidation (your choice).

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mikkian. Mikkian is a melodic, flowing tongue made up of several ancient dialects.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Miraluka reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Miraluka believe in balance and thus tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Miraluka typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Force-Sensitive
traits.description: You know the *mind trick* at-will force power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *sanctuary* force power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *force confusion* power once per day. Wisdom or Charisma (your choice) is your forcecasting ability for these powers.

traits.name: Force Sight
traits.description: Miraluka perceive the environment around them through use of the Force. You are constantly under the effects of the force power *force sight*, though the power does not require concentration for you.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Miralukese.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Mirialan reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Mirialans spiritual tendencies cause them to tend towards the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Mirialan typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and weight 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Spiritual
traits.description: You have proficiency in Lore. Additionally, you are considered to have expertise in Intelligence (Lore) checks made to learn or recall something about a culture's religion.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

traits.name: Unarmed Combatant
traits.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mirialan.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Mustafarians reach adulthood in their late teens and live about 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Mustafarians are usually judicious and value good work above all else, causing them to be lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Mustafarians stand between 5 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 165 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet. You ignore the strength property of heavy armor.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: As an originally cave-dwelling species, your eyes are adapted to the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Hide
traits.description: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Lava Dweller
traits.description: Your body is well accustomed to extreme heat, giving you resistance to fire damage. Additionally, your thick hide is naturally adapted to hot climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

traits.name: Refinery Specialist
traits.description: You have proficiency in your choice of constructor's implements, scavenging kit, or surveyor's implements. Additionally, whenever you make an Intelligence (Nature) check to identify a metal or mineral, you are considered to have expertise in the Nature skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mustafarian. Mustafarian consists of choppy clicks and emphatic groans.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Muuns reach adulthood in their late teens and live an average of a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Muuns' lawful culture nature causes them to tend toward lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Muuns typically stand 6 and a half to 7 feet tall and weigh around 200 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Finance Savvy
traits.description: Muun share a keen business sense and an ability to find value where others don't. Whenever you make a Charisma (Persuasion) check involving finances you are considered to have expertise in the Persuasion skill.

traits.name: Long-Limbed
traits.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

traits.name: Three Hearts
traits.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Muun. The Muuns' admiration of mathematics carries over into their language, which bares a striking resemblance to Binary.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Neimoidians reach adulthood in their 20s and live about 150 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Neimoidians' greedy nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Neimoidians typically stand around 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 135 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
traits.description: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Smooth Talker
traits.description: You have proficiency in Deception and Persuasion.

traits.name: Wealthy
traits.description: During character creation, you start with additional credits equal to your level x your proficiency bonus x 1,000 cr.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Pak Pak. Pak Pak is often considered an elegant-sounding language by those who hear it. It consists of husky sighs and guttural ululations.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Nikto reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Nikto's self-sufficient and clever nature causes them to tend toward balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Nikto typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Hide
traits.description: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Protective Membrane
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being blinded.

traits.name: Radiation Resistant
traits.description: The dying star nearby their homeworld makes nikto naturally used to radiation. You have resistance to necrotic damage.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Nikto, and Huttese. Nikto is spoken with sharp syllables with a deep and rumbling cadence.

traits.name: Adaptation
traits.description: The frequent radiation bursts from the nearby dying star caused the nikto to mutate and adapt into different subspecies over time, specialized for different environments. Choose one of the following adaptations:

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Noghri reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Noghri's honorable society causes them to tend toward a lawful alignment, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Noghri typically stand about 5 feet tall and weigh around 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Hunter
traits.description: You are proficient in Survival and Stealth.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Powerful Leap
traits.description: If you jump at least 10 feet in a straight line before hitting with a melee weapon attack, you can attempt to trip the target prone as part of the same attack. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Strong-Legged
traits.description: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Unarmed Combatant
traits.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Honorghran. Honorghran is characterized by its scratchy, gutteral sounds.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Nothoiin reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Nothoiins tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Nothoiins typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Born Pilots
traits.description: Nothoiins demonstrate seemingly innate piloting abilities from a very young age.  You have proficiency in the Piloting skill.

traits.name: Expert Navigators
traits.description: You are considered to have expertise in Wisdom (Survival) checks made to navigate.

traits.name: Galactic Traveler
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Lore skill.

traits.name: Heightened Reflexes
traits.description: Whenever you make a Dexterity ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can choose to add 1d4 to the result. You can use this before or after the roll, but before the GM determines the roll's outcome. Once you've used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.

traits.name: Major Miners
traits.description: Nothoiins have intimate knowledge of ur-diamond mining and refinement practices.  You gain proficiency in your choice of jeweler's implements, scavenging kit, or archaeologist kit.

traits.name: Starship Specialists
traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (Technology) check related to starships, you are considered to have expertise in the Technology skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one language of your choice. You can also communicate via Notho, a native hand language developed by hunters living in the Nothoiin plains.  Usage of Notho is exceedingly rare outside Nothoiin culture.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ortolans are considered adults at the age of seven and typically live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ortolans' love of food and music causes them to tend toward chaotic light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ortolans stand around 3 to 4 feet tall and weigh about 55 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Foragers
traits.description: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Survival) check to forage for food you are considered to have expertise in the Survival skill.

traits.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
traits.description: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Hide
traits.description: Your thick hide is naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing or smell.

traits.name: Musical
traits.description: You have proficiency in Performance and one musical instrument of your choice.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ortolan. Ortolan is characterized by its grunts and hoots.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Pa'lowick reach adulthood in their late teens and live about 75 years.

traits.name: Alignment
