traits.description: Pa'lowick enjoy a raucous good time, causing them to tend toward chaotic light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Pa'lowick stand about 5 feet tall, and weigh approximately 100 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: Pa'lowick have a great lung capacity and can hold their breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

traits.name: Proud Performer
traits.description: Pa'lowick are best known for the energy they can bring to a singing performance. Whenever you make a Charisma (Performance) check involving singing, you are considered to have expertise in the Performance skill.

traits.name: Snout
traits.description: You have supreme control over your snout and can use it to manipulate objects as well as your hands. Additionally, your snout is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Sonic Scream
traits.description: As an action, you can violently expel air in a 15-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). A creature takes 2d6 sonic damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 4d6 at 5th level, 6d6 at 11th level, and 8d6 at 17th level. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lowickese. Lowickese requires the user to purse their lips and blow air, and is considered amusing by other species.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence or Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Pantorans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Pantorans' interest in politics causes them to tend towards lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Pantorans typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Cold Adaptation
traits.description: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to avoid exhaustion due to extreme cold.

traits.name: Cultured
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Lore skill.

traits.name: Impose Order
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can command each ally within 15 feet of you to move up to half that ally's speed as a reaction. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Once you use this trait, you canï¿½t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Negotiators
traits.description: You have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks meant to negotiate terms or agreements between parties.

traits.name: Organized
traits.description: Your society values organization, and as such you are good at making good use of the space provided. When you are in charge of packing a space, such as a vehicle or cargo hold, that space's carrying capacity is increased by one-fourth its base capacity.

traits.name: Political Guile
traits.description: You are proficient in Persuasion or Deception (your choice).

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Pantoran. Pantoran comprises many dialects that prevent clear communication, a vestige of the feudal culture of the planet's past. Because of the difficulties of operating a planetary government with so many different languages, the Assembly established Galactic Basic as the official language of their people as a means of unifying the planet.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity or Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Patrolians reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Patrolians' greedy, scheming nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Patrolians typically stand just over 3 feet tall and generally weigh about 40 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Conniving
traits.description: You have proficiency in Deception or Stealth (your choice).

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underwater, you have superior vision in low light conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Electrical Resistance
traits.description: Patrolians are notably capable of shrugging off electricity. You have resistance to lightning damage.

traits.name: Specialist
traits.description: You have proficiency in one specialist's kit of your choice.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 25 feet.

traits.name: Technician
traits.description: You are proficient in the Technology skill.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Patrolian. Patrolian is a high-energy language, consisting mostly of gurgles and skittish vocalizations. Patrolian, even when spoken on land, sounds like it's being spoken underwater.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Pau'ans reach adulthood in their 30's and have been known to live up to 700 years old.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Pau'ans' commanding presence, yet friendly and kind nature, cause them to tend to be lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Pau'ans typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Authoritative
traits.description: You have proficiency in Persuasion or Intimidation (your choice).

traits.name: Cultured
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Lore skill.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Hypersensitive Hearing
traits.description: Pau'ans possess incredibly receptive hearing, often to their detriment, so you wear special covers on your ears. Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check involving hearing, you are considered to have expertise in the Perception skill, but if your hearing aids are removed, you have disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal sonic damage.

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.description: You can choose to have advantage on your next Initiative check. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Utapese. Utapese is characterized by its rigid, yet melodic sound.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Pykes reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Due to their underhanded nature, Pykes tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Pykes typically stand 6 to 6 and a half feet tall and generally weigh about 155 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Long-Limbed
traits.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

traits.name: Mercantile
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Deception, Persuasion, or Intimidation.

traits.name: Notorious Slavers
traits.description: Whenever you make an ability check related to the buying, selling, or controlling of slaves, you are considered proficient in the check. If you would already be proficient, you instead have expertise.

traits.name: Spicer
traits.description: You are proficient in spicer's kit.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Pyke. The Pyke language is characterized by its multisyllable grunts.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Quarren reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Quarren desire for equal rights causes them to tend toward balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Quarren typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh about 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Climb
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Ink Cloud
traits.description: As an action, you can expel ink in a 10-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, a creature is blinded until the end of its next turn. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Quarrenese. The Quarrenese language is characterized by its garbled nature that evokes an image of speaking underwater.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Quermians reach adulthood in their early teens and live a little under a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Querians philosophic culture causes them to tend toward light alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Quermians typically stand 7 to 8 feet tall and generally weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Diplomatic
traits.description: You have proficiency with Insight or Persuasion (your choice).

traits.name: Four-Armed
traits.description: Quermians have four arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

traits.name: Natural Empathy
traits.description: Quermians' talent at reading the body language of others allow them to sense the emotions in those around them. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine emotions against humanoids and beasts within 10 feet of you.

traits.name: Two Brains
traits.description: When you make a Wisdom saving throw, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on the roll. Once you've done so, you must complete a short or long rest before you can do so again.

traits.name: Watchful
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Quermian. You can also communicate with other quermians more effectively through a thorough understanding of body language that xenobiologists widely attribute to latent telepathy.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Rakata reach adulthoood by 20 and rarely live longer than 90 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Rakata's propensity towards war and aggression cause them to tend toward lawful dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Rakata typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 180 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Adaptive Resilience
traits.description: Prolongued use of technology allows rakata to readily adapt to its effects. You have advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws against tech powers.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Cannibalize
traits.description: If you spend at least 1 minute devouring the corpse of a beast or humanoid, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. Once you've used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Force-Insensitive
traits.description: While rakata can be manipulated by many force powers, they can not sense the Force. You can not use force powers or take levels in forcecasting classes.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Technician
traits.description: You are proficient in the Technology skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rakata. Rakata is characterized by its deep tones and simplistic nature, using mainly consonants and long vowels. It's script seems to be a very ancient form of Galactic Basic.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Dexterity or Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Rattataki reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Rattataki are self-serving and violent which causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Rattataki typically stand about 5 and a half feet tall and weigh 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Acrobatic
traits.description: You have proficiency in Acrobatics.

traits.name: Intimidating
traits.description: You have proficiency in Intimidation.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

traits.name: Unarmed Combatant
traits.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rattataki. Rattataki is known for have an inordinate amount of curses.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Rishii reach adulthood at 10 and generally live no longer than 60 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Rishii tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Rishii range from 4 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh less than 130 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. While wearing medium or heavy armor, your flying speed is reduced by half.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.description: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rishii. Rishii's clicks, trills, and whistles are difficult for outsiders to learn without the aid of a protocol droid, and so Rishii often feel comfortable speaking to eachother in the language in front of others.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence or Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ryn reach adulthood in their early teens and live about 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ryn's superstitious and solitary nature causes them to tend toward balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ryn typically stand 4 and a half to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 120 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Con Artist
traits.description: You have proficiency in one gaming set of your choice.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Divination
traits.description: Whether through mystical divination or sheer luck, you can turn failures into successes. When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Eternal Nomads
traits.description: You have proficiency in Lore or Survival (your choice).

traits.name: Musical
traits.description: You have proficiency in Performance and one musical instrument of your choice.

traits.name: Prehensile Tail
traits.description: You have supreme control over your tail and can use it to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ryn. Ryn uses tones and inflections and is easily described as melodious by anyone who hears it. You can communicate with droids and other ryn without using words through the use of your beak.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Selkath reach adulthood in their late teens and live up to 100 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Selkath have been renowned for countless millenia of the careful preservation of neutrality. As such individuals tend towards the neutral balanced alignment, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Selkath typically stand between 4 and a half to 5 and a half feet tall and average 130 pounds. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property. Lastly, as a bonus action, you can perform a special claw attack. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, the target is poisoned until the end of its next turn, and you can't use this feature again until you complete a short or long rest.

traits.name: Gift of the Progenitor
traits.description: You know the *temporary boost* at-will tech power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *kolto pack* tech power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *kolto cloud* tech power once per day. Your techcasting ability is Intelligence. You do not require use of a wristpad for these powers.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Selkatha. Selkatha has a very moist and gurgling tone to it.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Selonians reach adulthood in their mid teens and live for about 75 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Selonians are serious and den-focused, causing them to tend towards lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Selonians typically stand 6 to 7 feet tall and generally weigh about 180 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Climb
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 35 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canï¿½t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Nimble Agility
traits.description: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the tum. Once you use this trait, you canï¿½t use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

traits.name: Tail and Claw
traits.description: Your strong tail and razor-sharp claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 35 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mandaba. Selonians use the name "Home Talk" to refer to their own language.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Shistavanen reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Shistavanen are private and tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Shistavanen typically stand around 6 feet tall and weigh between 140 and 190 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Forced March
traits.description: Shistavanen are able to maintain a fast pace longer than other species. Shistavanen have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to avoid Exhaustion due to prolongued travel, as described in Chapter 8.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing or smell.

traits.name: Regenerative
traits.description: When you take damage, you can use your reaction and expend a Hit Die to regain hit points as long as the damage would not reduce your hit points to 0.

traits.name: Tooth and Nail
traits.description: Your fangs and claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Shistavanen. The Shistavanen language is characterized by its barks and growls.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Squibs reach adulthood at nine years of age and live an average of sixty-five years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Squibs' cheerful nature causes them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Squibs typically stand 3 to 3 and a half feet tall and weigh around 50 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Bite
traits.description: Your sharp teeth are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Business Savvy
traits.description: A common trait of all Squibs is their desire and love of haggling. Squibs believe a deal is done when both sides believe they got the better of the other. Whenever you make a Charisma (Persuasion) check involving haggling you are considered to have expertise in the Persuasion skill.

traits.name: Flexible Cheeks
traits.description: Squibs have flexible cheeks in which they can store small goods. You can store up to two items that weigh a combined total of no more than 2 lb. in your cheeks, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks made to conceal them.

traits.name: Hide
traits.description: Your thick hide is naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Sensitive Fur
traits.description: Squibs' fur is exceptionally sensitive to physical details. You have advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks that rely on touch.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Squibbian. The Squibbian language originated as a secret form of communication for Squibs to convey information without being understood.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ssi-ruuk reach adulthood in their early teens and live to between 100 and 120 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ssi-ruuk's cultural drive to enslave and entech others cause them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ssi-ruuk typically stand between 6 or 7 feet tall and weigh over 300 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Type
traits.description: Your creature type is both beast and humanoid.

traits.name: Force-Insensitive
traits.description: While Ssi-ruuk can be manipulated by many force powers, they can not sense the Force. You can not use force powers or take levels in forcecasting classes.

traits.name: Hunter
traits.description: You are proficient in Survival.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Natural Empathy
traits.description: Ssi-ruuk have scent-tongues that let them read the emotions of individuals. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine emotions against humanoids and beasts within 10 feet of you.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Thick Skin
traits.description: You have tough, scaly skin and prefer not to wear clothes. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Tooth and Nail
traits.description: Your fangs and claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ssi-ruuvi. Ssi-ruuvi is a language of musical whistles, honks and clicks, and is nigh impossible for humans and similar species to speak.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Sullustan reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Sullustans' outgoing and friendly nature cause them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Sullustans typically stand 4 and a half to 5 feet tall and weigh around 120 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Mercantile
traits.description: Whenever you make a Charisma (Persuasion) check related to conducting business, you are considered to have expertise in the Persuasion skill.

traits.name: Pilot
traits.description: You have proficiency in Piloting.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Sullestese, and one more language of your choice. Sullestese is characterized as a robust language in business, and as such is commonly learned by professional merchants.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Talz reach adulthood at 10 and rarely live longer than 50 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Talz' peaceful and slow-to-anger nature cause them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Talz stand between 6 and 8 feet tall and weigh around 250 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Hide
traits.description: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier. Additionally, your thick hide is naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

traits.name: Long-Limbed
traits.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Talzzi. You can understand spoken and written Galactic Basic, but your vocal cords do not allow you to speak it. Talzzi is characterized by its high-pitched chirps and buzzes.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Tarasins reach adulthood at 10 and live less than 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Tarasins' curious yet composed nature causes them to tend toward balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Tarasins typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 130 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Chameleon Skin
traits.description: Your scales are translucent, allowing your color-shifting skin to help you blend into your surroundings. You have proficiency in the Stealth skill. Additionally, you can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Jungle Dweller
traits.description: Growing up in the jungles of Cularin has left an impact. You don't treat jungle terrain as difficult terrain.

traits.name: Naturalist
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Nature skill.

traits.name: Sa'tosin Sense
traits.description: Tarasins have short spines called sa'tosin that allow them to sense the use of the Force. You are constantly under the effects of the force power *sense force*, though the power does not require concentration for you.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Tarasinese. You can communicate non-verbally with other tarasins through use of a complex system of skin color changes.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Taung reach adulthood at 13 and live to around 85, though they rarely live even half the length as they naturally can due to their deadly lifestyles as Mandalorians.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: The taung live by the traditions and honor-bound code of the Mandalorians, making them tend towards a lawful alignment, typically balanced or dark, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Taung typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 210 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Taung Weapon Training
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one vibroweapon and one blaster of your choice.

traits.name: Menacing
traits.description: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

traits.name: Force Insensitive
traits.description: While taung can be manipulated by the force, they cannot sense the Force. You can not use force powers or take levels in forcecasting classes.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mando'a. Mando'a is primarily a spoken language and is very expressive with simple grammar.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Theelin reach adulthood in their late teens and live for about 70 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Theelin's good-nature and positivity despite the dour state of their species causes them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Theelin typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Expressive
traits.description: You have proficiency in your choice of artist's implements, disguise kits, synthweaver's implements, or one musical instrument of your choice.

traits.name: Performer
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Performance skill.

traits.name: Skill Versatility
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one extra language of your choice.

traits.name: Mutation
traits.description: Theelin gain unique mutations, a result of cross-breeding with other humanoids. Choose one of the following mutations.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Thisspiasians reach adulthood in their 20s and often live more than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Thisspiasians' emotional composure causes them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Thisspiasians typically stand 5 to 6 and a half feet tall and generally weigh about 300 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Cultured
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Lore skill.

traits.name: Four-Armed
traits.description: Thisspiasians have four arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: Your calm demeanor and control make you hard to read. Wisdom (Insight) checks made against you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on any saving throw against an effect that would read your thoughts.

traits.name: Prehensile Tail
traits.description: You have supreme control over your tail and can use it to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You only need 3 hours of sleep during a long rest to gain its benefits, instead of 6. Additionally, if your long rest would be interrupted, you only need to complete the long rest instead of restarting it to gain its benefits.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Thisspiasian. Thisspiasian is a complex language characterized by its interlocking sentences and heavy use of sibilants.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Strength, Intelligence, or Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Tiss'shar reach adulthood in their early teens and live about 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Tiss'shar's moral flexibility causes them to tend towards balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Tiss'shar typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canï¿½t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Predatory Talents
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills: Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, or Technology.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

traits.name: Tooth and Nail
traits.description: Your sharp teeth and claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage. Lastly, as a bonus action, you can perform a special bite attack. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1), and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Tiss'shar. Tiss'shar is mainly formed of hisses, shrieks, and lisping vocalizations. As a written language, it has a violent-looking calligraphy of curves and sharp lines.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution scores increase by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Tognath reach adulthood by 10 and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Tognath are famously dedicated and hard workers, causing them to tend towards balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Tognath typically stand 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Crafters
traits.description: You have proficiency with one set of artisan's implements of your choice.

traits.name: Exoskeleton
traits.description: You have a thick exoskeleton. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Foreign Biology
traits.description: You cannot breathe oxygen. The tognath have created a breathing apparatus to negate the negative effects of living in an oxygen rich environment, but if your mask is removed while you are in such an environment, you lose consciousness.

traits.name: Life in the Void
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage, and while exposed to the vacuum of space, you can survive for a number of hours equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 1 hour), instead of a number of rounds.

traits.name: Primitive Nerves
traits.description: Because of their primitive nervous systems, tognath are immune to most pain, letting them shrug off major injuries. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. Once you've used this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Vocalizer
traits.description: Tognath vocal cords are not made for oxygen rich environments, and rely on a vocalizer to communicate effectively with other species. If your vocalizer is removed or destroyed, your voice becomes quiet and difficult to understand.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Tognath. You can understand spoken and written Galactic Basic, but your vocal cords do not allow you to speak it.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity or Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Togorian reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Togorians' rigid sense of honor causes them to tend toward lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Togorians tower over almost all other species, with smaller females standing upwards of 7 feet tall and weighing 250 lbs., while males can easily reach 8 feet tall and weigh around 350 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Savage Attacks
traits.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

traits.name: Stealthy Hunter
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Survival and Stealth skills.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Togorese. Togorese is characterized by its deep, resonating growls.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Toydarians reach adulthood at 10 and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Toydarians' greedy nature causes them to tend toward chaotic balanced, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Toydarians average 4 feet tall and weigh less than 50 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Business Savvy
traits.description: A common trait of all Toydarians is their shrewd business sense and their ability to haggle any deal. A loyal and proud people, these traits could be off-putting to outsiders, as many Toydarians in the galaxy were seen as crooks or slimy businessmen, but this was not always the case. Whenever you make a Charisma (Persuasion) check involving haggling you are considered to have expertise in the Persuasion skill.

traits.name: Closed Mind
traits.description: Toydarian brains have an unusual composition which made them resistant to influence from the Force. You have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against force powers.

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. While wearing medium or heavy armor, your flying speed is reduced by half.

traits.name: Shrewd Demeanor
traits.description: You have proficiency in two Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma skills of your choice.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Huttese, and Toydarian.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ugnaughts reach adulthood at 20 and can live to reach 200.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ugnaughts tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ugnaughts typically stand around 4 feet and weigh about 50 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25.

traits.name: Bite
traits.description: Your tusks are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Crafters
traits.description: You have proficiency in one tool of your choice.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Industrial Hazards
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

traits.name: Tech Dabbler
traits.description: You know the *mending* at-will tech power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *analyze* tech power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *overheat* tech power once per day. Your techcasting ability is Intelligence. You do not require use of a wristpad for these powers.

traits.name: Tinker
traits.description: You have proficiency with tinker's implements. You can use these and spend 1 hour and 100 cr worth of materials to construct a Tiny Device (AC 5, 1 hp). You can take the Use an Object action to have your device cause one of the following effects: create a small explosion, create a repeating loud noise for 1 minute, create smoke for 1 minute, cause harmless tremors for 1 minute. You can maintain a number of these devices up to your proficiency bonus at once, and a device stops functioning after 24 hours away from you. You can dismantle the device to reclaim the materials used to create it.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ugnaught. The Ugnaught language is composed of grunts, squeals, and chatters, and is difficult for other species to learn.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ugors reach adulthood in their early teens and live about 70 years, though some live to be over 100.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ugors are loyal to their theocratic state and see outsiders as expendable. Many follow a Lawful Balanced alignment, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ugors typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh 130 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Amorphous Form
traits.description: You can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided you are wearing and carrying nothing. You also have advantage on ability checks you make to initiate or escape a grapple.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canï¿½t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Galactic Scavengers
traits.description: You have proficiency in mechanic's kits or scavenging kits (your choice).

traits.name: Natural Resilience
traits.description: You have resistance to poison damage, and you have advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Shape Self
traits.description: If you are not incapacitated, you can reshape your body to give yourself a head, one or two arms, one or two legs, and makeshift hands and feet, or you can revert to a limbless blob (no action required). As a bonus action, you can extrude a pseudopod that is up to 6 inches wide and 10 feet long or reabsorb it into your body. You can use this pseudopod to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour out the contents of a container. The pseudopod canï¿½t attack, activate enhanced items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read and write in Galactic Basic and Ugor. Additionally, Your vocal range allows you to speak languages other species might have difficulty with.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma or Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Umbarans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Umbarans' desire to improve their social standing at all costs causes them to tend towards chaos, though there are exceptions

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Umbarans typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: You've lived most of your life without direct sunlight. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Umbaran Specilization
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills: Insight, Technology, Deception, or Perception.

traits.name: Tech Dabbler
traits.description: You know the *ward* at-will tech power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *analyze* tech power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the *infiltrate* tech power once per day. Intelligence is your techcasting ability for these powers. You do not require use of a wristpad for these powers.

traits.name: Shadow People
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by dim light.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Umbaran. Umbaran is characterized by its blending of technical jargon with informal language. It is rarely spoken off Umbara.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Verpine reach adulthood in their 40's and live an average of 200 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Verpine's altruistic and generous nature cause them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Verpine stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and rarely weigh more than 120 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Crafters
traits.description: You have proficiency in one tool of your choice.

traits.name: Hardened Carapace
traits.description: While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

traits.name: Tympanic Antennae
traits.description: You have tremorsense out to 30 feet. You can detect and pinpoint the origin of vibrations within that radius, provided that monster and the source of the vibrations are in contact with the same ground or substance. Tremorsense can't be used to detect flying or incorporeal creatures

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Verpine. You can understand spoken and written Galactic Basic, but your vocal cords do not allow you to speak it. You can communicate with other Verpine at distances of up to a mile using your antennae.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Voss reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century. They do not reach sexual maturity until they undergo the Rite of Ardor.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: As Voss culture encourages duty and emotional composure, individuals tend toward a lawful alignment, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Voss typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

traits.name: Precognition
traits.description: You see brief visions of the future, that allow you to turn failures into successes. When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Mystic Healing
traits.description: You have proficiency in Medicine.

traits.name: Voss Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the blaster rifle and techblade.

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: Your calm demeanor and control make you hard to read. Wisdom (Insight) checks made against you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on any saving throw against an effect that would read your thoughts.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Voss. The Voss language is characterized by it's mystic-sounding word pairings.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Vurk reach adulthood in their 20s and live an average of 70 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Vurk philosophies cause them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Vurks typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 175 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underwater, you have superior vision in low light conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Head Crest
traits.description: Your head crest is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Semblan. Semblan has a very melodic feel and often evokes images of waterfalls to those who don't understand its meanings.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Xexto reach adulthood at 9 and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Despite being avid thrillseekers, xexto are calm and even tempered, tending them towards balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Xexto typically stand 3 to 5 feet tall and generally weigh about 50 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Dexterous
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills: Acrobatics, Piloting, or Sleight of Hand.

traits.name: Fearless
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Four-Armed
traits.description: Xexto have four arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

traits.name: Jungle Dweller
traits.description: Growing up in the rainforests of Troiken has left an impact. You donï¿½t treat jungle terrain as difficult terrain.

traits.name: Racer's Reflexes
traits.description: Whenever you make a Dexterity ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can choose to add 1d4 to the result. You cannot do so again until you complete a short or long rest.

traits.name: Split Mind
traits.description: When you make a Wisdom saving throw, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on the roll. Once you've done so, you must complete a short or long rest before you can do so again.

traits.name: Treeclimber
traits.description: You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. You have advantage on Strength ability checks and saving throws that involve climbing.

traits.name: Undersized
traits.description: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You canï¿½t use heavy shields. Additionally, you canï¿½t use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Xextese. Xextese is a blubbering sort of language, with many metaphors for natural phenomenon found in its vocabulary.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Yevetha reach adulthood in their early teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Yevetha's xenophobic attitude causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Yevetha typically stand between 6 and 6 and a half feet tall and generally weigh about 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

traits.name: Arm Blades
traits.description: Your retractable dewclaws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Mechanical Memory
traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (Technology) check related to memorizing or duplicating mechanical readouts, you are considered to have expertise in the Technology skill.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Yevethan. Yevetha are able to speak other languages, but their isolationist nature makes them tend to reject the languages of other species. Only rarely would a Yevethan speak Galactic Basic, as this would often decrease their social standing.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Zeltron reach adulthood in their late teens and live about 80 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Zeltron are a deeply sensual, hedonistic species, causing them to tend toward chaotic balanced or dark side alignments, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Zeltron tend to be slender and statuesque, typically standing between 5 and 6 feet tall and rarely weighing more than 150 lb. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Charismatic
traits.description: You have proficiency with Deception or Persuasion (your choice).

traits.name: Enthralling Pheromones
traits.description: You can use your pheromones to influence individuals of both sexes. Whenever you roll a 1 on a Charisma (Persuasion) check, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. Additionally, once per short or long rest, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower on a Charisma check as a 10. This feature has no effect on droids or constructs.

traits.name: Natural Empathy
traits.description: Zeltron's limited telepathy allow them to sense mood shifts in those around them. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine emotions against humanoids and beasts within 10 feet of you.

traits.name: Two Livered
traits.description: Zeltron have two livers, which makes them adept at filtering toxins. You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage (explained in chapter 9).

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one language of your choice.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Zilkin are considered adults at 4 years old, and rarely live to be over 12.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Zilkin have an outspoken but just nature that causes them to tend towards lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Zilkin stand between 1 and 2 feet tall and weigh around 10 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Tiny.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 20 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underwater, you have superior vision in low light conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Pintsized
traits.description: Your tiny stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use medium or heavy shields. Additionally, you can't wield weapons with the two-handed or versatile property, and you can only wield one-handed weapons in two hands unless they have the light property.

traits.name: Puny
traits.description: Zilkin are too small to pack much of a punch. You have disadvantage on Strength saving throws, and when determining your bonus to attack and damage rolls for weapon attacks using Strength, you can't add more than +3.

traits.name: Quick Learner
traits.description: When using downtime for learning a new language or training with a set of tools, it takes half the amount of time and credits necessary to complete.

traits.name: Small and Nimble
traits.description: You are too small and fast to effectively target. You have a +1 bonus to AC, and you have advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

traits.name: Strong-Legged
traits.description: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 20 feet.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Zilkin. Zilkin is characterized by loud, croaking noises from the throat, supported by air stored in the chin.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Zygerrians reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Zygerrian culture's emphasis on subjugation and strength causes them to tend towards chaotic dark side, though there are exceptions.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Zygerrians normally stand between 5 to 6 feet tall and weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Acrobatic
traits.description: You have proficiency in Acrobatics.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have a cat's keen senses, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Notorious Slavers
traits.description: Whenever you make an ability check related to the buying, selling, or controlling of slaves, you are considered proficient in the check. If you would already be proficient, you instead have expertise.

traits.name: Reputation for Cruelty
traits.description: You are proficient in Intimidation, as well as the saberwhip and vibrowhip.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Zygerrian. Zygerrian is characterized by its subtle growls and purrs.
